name: Mensch Craft
description:
Introduction
Mensch Craft, the nostalgic of "Ludo", now you can play online with other players.
Board games special Mensch Craft are the best way to spend your time.

Play with your friends, even if you're distanced!

Key features:

- Multiplayer 2-4 players, offline and online
- Playing offline with bots or friends on one device
- Chat during the game with friends
- Customizable pieces with cool frames and symbols
